General_Overview_&_Reviews.title: Seborrheic dermatitis and dandruff: A comprehensive review.
General_Overview_&_Reviews.journal: Journal of Clinical and Investigative Dermatology
General_Overview_&_Reviews.key_finding: Comprehensive review of seborrheic dermatitis and dandruff, covering etiology, pathogenesis, and treatment options.

General_Overview_&_Reviews.title: Seborrheic dermatitis.
General_Overview_&_Reviews.key_finding: Detailed overview of seborrheic dermatitis, including clinical features, diagnosis, and management strategies.

General_Overview_&_Reviews.title: The role of sebaceous gland activity and scalp microfloral metabolism in the etiology of seborrheic dermatitis and dandruff.
General_Overview_&_Reviews.journal: Journal of Investigative Dermatology Symposium Proceedings
General_Overview_&_Reviews.key_finding: Exploration of the interaction between sebaceous gland activity and scalp microfloral metabolism in the etiology of seborrheic dermatitis and dandruff.

General_Overview_&_Reviews.title: Malassezia‚Äêassociated skin diseases, the use of diagnostics and treatments.
General_Overview_&_Reviews.journal: Frontiers in Cellular and Infection Microbiology
General_Overview_&_Reviews.key_finding: Review of Malassezia's role in various skin diseases, diagnostic methods, and therapeutic approaches.

Malassezia_Biology_&_Lipid_Metabolism.title: Distribution of Malassezia species in patients with different dermatological diseases.
Malassezia_Biology_&_Lipid_Metabolism.key_finding: Study on the prevalence and distribution of different Malassezia species in patients with various dermatological diseases.

Malassezia_Biology_&_Lipid_Metabolism.title: Unraveling lipid metabolism in lipid-dependent pathogenic yeasts Malassezia spp.
Malassezia_Biology_&_Lipid_Metabolism.key_finding: Doctoral research investigating the complex lipid metabolism pathways in Malassezia species.

Malassezia_Biology_&_Lipid_Metabolism.title: A study of the fatty acid metabolism of the yeast Pityrosporum ovale.
Malassezia_Biology_&_Lipid_Metabolism.key_finding: Early research on the fatty acid metabolic processes in Pityrosporum ovale (now Malassezia ovale).

Malassezia_Biology_&_Lipid_Metabolism.title: Growth requirements and lipid metabolism of Pityrosporum orbiculare.
Malassezia_Biology_&_Lipid_Metabolism.key_finding: Investigation into the specific growth requirements and lipid metabolic pathways of Pityrosporum orbiculare.

Malassezia_Biology_&_Lipid_Metabolism.title: Expression of lipases and phospholipases of Malassezia restricta in patients with seborrheic dermatitis.
Malassezia_Biology_&_Lipid_Metabolism.key_finding: Study on the expression levels of lipase and phospholipase enzymes by Malassezia restricta in seborrheic dermatitis patients.

Pathogenesis_Barrier_&_Immunity.title: Presence of Malassezia hyphae is correlated with pathogenesis of seborrheic dermatitis.
Pathogenesis_Barrier_&_Immunity.key_finding: Research indicating a correlation between the presence of Malassezia hyphae and the pathogenic mechanisms of seborrheic dermatitis.

Pathogenesis_Barrier_&_Immunity.title: An overview of the diagnosis and management of seborrheic dermatitis.
Pathogenesis_Barrier_&_Immunity.key_finding: Practical guide to the diagnosis and management strategies for seborrheic dermatitis.

Pathogenesis_Barrier_&_Immunity.title: Seborrheic dermatitis: Exploring the complex interplay with the skin barrier, immunity, and microbiome.
Pathogenesis_Barrier_&_Immunity.key_finding: Future-looking research exploring the intricate relationships between seborrheic dermatitis, skin barrier function, immune responses, and the microbiome.

Pathogenesis_Barrier_&_Immunity.title: Seborrheic dermatitis revisited: Pathophysiology, diagnosis, and management.
Pathogenesis_Barrier_&_Immunity.key_finding: Updated review on the pathophysiology, diagnostic criteria, and management approaches for seborrheic dermatitis.

Pathogenesis_Barrier_&_Immunity.title: Cutaneous Malassezia: Commensal, pathogen, or protector?
Pathogenesis_Barrier_&_Immunity.journal: Frontiers in Cellular and Infection Microbiology
Pathogenesis_Barrier_&_Immunity.key_finding: Discussion on the multifaceted role of cutaneous Malassezia, ranging from commensal to pathogen or even protector.

Treatment_Protocols.title: Clinical and biochemical assessment of maintenance treatment in chronic recurrent seborrheic dermatitis.
Treatment_Protocols.key_finding: Assessment of maintenance treatment efficacy for specific recurrent seborrheic dermatitis via clinical and biochemical markers.

Treatment_Protocols.title: Modulating the skin mycobiome with probiotic-enriched oily suspension.
Treatment_Protocols.key_finding: Study on using probiotic-enriched oily suspensions to modulate the skin mycobiome as a therapeutic approach.

Treatment_Protocols.title: Nutrition, obesity, and seborrheic dermatitis: Systematic review.
Treatment_Protocols.key_finding: Systematic review exploring connections between nutrition, obesity, and seborrheic dermatitis incidence or severity.

Treatment_Protocols.title: Seborrhoeic dermatitis.
Treatment_Protocols.key_finding: Cochrane review summarizing evidence for various treatments of seborrheic dermatitis.
